sentence.text: Importantly, bone cell activity was inversely correlated to tumor cell AR activity (measured as AR, FOXA1, negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, KLK2, plasminogen activation, NKX3-1, STEAP2, and TMPRSS2 expression) and to patient serum prostate-specific antigen (PSA) levels.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
